title: ‘I hope people respect the Tour de France’: Peloton contemplates return to riot-affected France
content:
Yates, Madiot, and Welsford react to possibility of protests as race reaches home soil on stage 3 with beefed-up security.

Read the full article at ‘I hope people respect the Tour de France’: Peloton contemplates return to riot-affected France on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
